parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the sketch text position

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the sketch text position

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the sketch text position

title: ISketchText.SetCoordinates
description: Sets the position of this sketch text.
signature:
System.Boolean SetCoordinates( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the sketch text position

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the sketch text position

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the sketch text position

returns: True if the sketch text position is successfully set, false if not
remarks:
To set the sketch text position, you must be editing the sketch. See
IModelDoc2::EditSketch
or
ISketchManager::InsertSketch
.
To get the position of this sketch text, use
ISketchText::GetCoordinates
and
ISketchText::IGetCoordinates
.
